mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(username, password, email, full_name, location, authority_code, status) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{fullName}, #{location}, #{authorityCode}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT username FROM USER WHERE username = #{username})
SELECT * FROM USER WHERE username = #{username} AND status != 'DELETE'
SELECT * FROM USER WHERE id = #{userId} AND status != 'DELETE'
mapper.update: update user set full_name = #{fullName}, password = #{password}, location = #{location}, updated_at = NOW() where id = #{id}
